police_fire_ambulance.when_to_call: Life threatening emergencies, serious injuries, fires, crimes in progress

poison_control.when_to_call: Chemical exposure, ingestion of harmful substances

non_emergency_police.when_to_call: Minor accidents, property damage, noise complaints

urgent_care_nearby.name: Patient First Burke
urgent_care_nearby.notes: Good for cuts requiring stitches, sprains, minor injuries

gas_emergency.when_to_call: Gas leaks, gas odors, damaged gas lines

electric_emergency.when_to_call: Downed power lines, electrical hazards, power outages

water_sewer_emergency.when_to_call: Water main breaks, sewer backups, water quality issues

dig_safe_call_before_you_dig.when_to_call: At least 3 business days before digging
dig_safe_call_before_you_dig.notes: Required by law - free utility marking service

building_inspector.when_to_call: Inspection scheduling, permit questions, code compliance

code_enforcement.when_to_call: Neighbor complaints, code violations, setback questions

structural_engineer.specialties: Beam sizing, load calculations, complex deck designs

plumber.when_to_call: Water line issues, gas line work

general_contractor_backup.when_to_call: Project rescue, complex problems beyond DIY capability

home_depot_burke.hours: Monday-Saturday 6 AM - 10 PM, Sunday 8 AM - 8 PM

84_lumber.hours: Monday-Friday 7 AM - 5 PM, Saturday 7 AM - 12 PM

home_depot_tool_rental.hours: Monday-Friday 7 AM - 7 PM, Saturday 7 AM - 6 PM, Sunday 9 AM - 5 PM
home_depot_tool_rental.common_tools: Power augers, compressors, saws, nail guns

united_rentals.hours: Monday-Friday 7 AM - 5 PM, Saturday 7 AM - 12 PM

a1_equipment_rental.hours: Monday-Friday 7:30 AM - 5 PM, Saturday 8 AM - 2 PM

project_coordinator.role: Main decision maker, permit holder, budget manager

neighbor_emergency_contact.notes: Nearby neighbor for emergencies when family not home

homeowners_insurance.when_to_call: Damage to property, liability issues, coverage questions

umbrella_policy.notes: Additional liability coverage for construction activities

legal_counsel.specialties: Property law, construction disputes, permit issues
legal_counsel.when_to_call: Neighbor disputes, permit denials, liability concerns

weather_emergency.when_to_use: Severe weather warnings, construction weather planning

tree_emergency.when_to_call: Storm damaged trees, trees threatening construction

serious_injury: 2. Do not move injured person unless in immediate danger
3. Apply direct pressure to bleeding wounds
4. Stay with injured person until help arrives
power_tool_accident: 3. Call 911 for serious cuts or injuries
5. Do not attempt to remove embedded objects
chemical_exposure: 2. Flush affected area with clean water for 15 minutes
4. Have product label/safety data sheet available
structural_collapse: 3. Do not attempt rescue if unsafe
5. Do not re-enter area until cleared by professionals
gas_leak_suspected: 1. Do not use electrical switches or create sparks
5. Do not return until cleared by gas company
electrical_hazard: 1. Do not touch person in contact with electricity
2. Turn off power at breaker if safely accessible
5. Keep others away from hazard area

first_aid_kit_location.construction_kit: Tool storage area on job site

important_notes: Keep this contact list posted at job site in weather-protected location
Ensure all family members know location of this information
Update phone numbers and add local contacts as project progresses
Program key emergency numbers into all project participants' phones
Review emergency procedures with all helpers before starting work
Keep first aid kit stocked and easily accessible during construction
Notify neighbors of construction schedule and emergency contact info
Post project coordinator contact info where helpers can easily find it
